name: antsama
text: This forever changed how I leave apologetic messages.

name: mustakrakesh
text: I know I will forever apologize by verbally signing all satements of apology.

name: cracklewater
text: Don't forget to pause a beat after 'From', to indicate the comma.

name: dondoran
text: I think instead of "From," I will use "By," and then pause.  As if I had just allowed the recipient of my apology to hear an interesting story of my creation.

name: dusty
text: It also works with marriage proposals.

name: 21echoes
text: This is why the strip is a 5

name: kingcrimson
text: This whole arc is a 5. The Mexican Realism RV, Raising Your Hands Day, Flashing the Sunflower, Ray's apology, Pat's face ballooning... I'm going through the archive and this is good stuff

name: terribleman
text: I know, dude. I always say 2005 is the best year, but it just kept on being awesome. This strip has me in cramps!

name: soticoto
text: YOU CAN'T JUST COMMENT! TODAY IS A RAISING YOUR HAND DAY! THAT'S JUST THE WAY IT IS!   >8o<

name: werthog42
text: I want an illustration of what Ray says in the last panel.

name: agika
text: A comment left by agika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by luckypyjamas, chaesar, scraggg, clintisiceman, Darthemed)

name: mugi
text: It's somehow funnier when left to the imagination.

name: snowman
text: This whole strip is just, so...well written.

name: saint
text: baloonin, but smilin...

name: agika
text: Big shiny dollar signs for eyes, all going "Cha-ching!" over and over again...

name: totoro23
text: i wanna a picture of Pat's face as he's running. it would be classic achewood

name: buttermoths
text: The picture Onstad has created in your mind is far greater than any drawing any man could ever make would be.

name: behka
text: i love how nice pete is in some ways controlled by pat, as evidenced here.  after all there is a Complicated Power Dynamic in that house

name: jesler729
text: Yeah, I'd really like to see more of the Nice Pete/Pat thing.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Nice Pete's got some issues.

name: smilebuddha
text: Nice Pete has a subscription .

name: rykan
text: A chubby for you, sir!

name: hyetal
text: Bra vo .

name: greenkoolayd
text: im surprised nice pete isnt walking around in pats skin.

name: agika
text:
"BA-DUMP BUMP! Rim shot! Heyo!"

Damn, but I just would've hung up on Ray at that point - so damn obnoxious. :)

name: shutup_shutup
text: It's hard to hang up on someone when they are leaving a message.

name: heatbag
text: I love the idea of there being a Raising Your Hand day. You can't just talk, that's just the way it is that day.

name: nabeel84
text: And who calls anybody anymore? Who does that?

name: zem
text: I might like a funny-ass

name: luckypyjamas
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: aelindil
text: BOO TO THAT

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, n00b, tttt2, Cracklewater, Doc_Rostov, eidolem)

name: honesttom
text: I like the long strips. Several jokes per strip = good.

name: dusty
text: This is like when people complain that a restaurant's portions are too big. If that's how you feel just read half the strip now, then save the other half for later.

name: trevor
text: The murderer cat is submissive to the vegan cat.

name: closefriend
text: Except that the vegan cat is a murderer cat.

name: riazm
text: Wait..Pat's never fully iced someone has he? I mean, he's shot a couple of guys before yeah...but totally on accident dude! They got better!

name: ssddr
text: He was going after Vlad with murderous intent when he shot Mr. Bear

name: connellingus
text: He was trying to protect himself from Roast Beef . He was going after Vlad when he shot Beef.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: so, he ended up getting his man, anyway!

name: terribleman
text: He's kindof an accomplice by harboring mr. Cropes.

name: terribleman
text: Kindof, haha

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I like to think that the reason Ray doesn't apologize is that he genuinely thinks he's done nothing wrong. Ever.

name: juancarlos
text: I disagree, Ray is mad-humble when he screws up. It's just that he's too proud and gets embarrassed to do it, like the time he apologized for saying *him* and Teodor should loose some weight.

name: 1000hz
text: or in this strip .

name: dovey
text: Ray doesn't apologise because he realises a six hundo is a much classier salve.

name: william
text: Alt Text: Nice Pete wasn't being sarcastic. There is a complicated power dynamic in that house.

name: aaron_haynes
text: This is possibly my favorite alt text in Achewood.

name: cicadalek
text: I like how Ray treats voice messages like written letters in the third-to-last panel. That's so, well, Ray.

name: steerpike66
text: Ray's final comment raises this one to 4.

name: pkitty
text: After panel one, this strip could have been eleven panels of scans from Good Housekeeping and it still would've been worth a straight five. Pat's assholitude has (for the moment, at least) taken alpha status over Pete's homicidalness. One beautiful, crazy dynamic in that house.

name: geozimmdrake
text: i gave this one a 5 mostly for nice pete raising his hand when the phone rings.

name: mugi
text: His face is priceless.

name: dumase
text:
"From, Ray Smuckles"

My dad is sort of technology-illiterate. So when he is talking to me on msn he has this weird thing where he thinks we're writing letters to each other with each sentence:

Father says:
I've got to go now and start making supper. So i'll see you tomorrow.

Father says:
Love, Dad.

name: hateandwar
text: this is so touching

name: xiaomimi
text:
Tuesday Blogs

Ray: Don't huff!

Today's Blogs

Mr. Bear: Pub name correction from Ray.
Onstad: A brief statement on the position that golf occupies in my life.

name: tellumo
text: I like the golf-biography blog posts. Hopefully Onstad will be able to get a few rounds in up in Portland and thus be inspired to write funny things.

name: terribleman
text:
God dammit, these are all pure gold. As something of a natural man of golf, I particularly enjoyed Onstad's, but holy hell. Quality right here. Hey-o!

The blogs basically need a discussion board.

name: tttt2
text: nobody likes someone who is funny

name: biznart
text: That is easily the best defiant hand-raise in history.  I dare anyone to come up with a better one.

name: westsider8
text:
How about this:
[IMGS OFF]

name: fineoakstructure
text: I think you met the challenge, and are the victor.

name: biznart
text: You win. This time.

name: westsider8
text: Victory is sweet. Sticking it to the Man is even sweeter.

name: thehelmet
text: I only now realized that the only plausible reason for the two of them raising different hands is that they're wearing one glove each from the same pair..

name: biznart
text: Nothing wrong with being thrifty while sticking it to the Man.

name: smilebuddha
text: Hm.  Much easier to buy a pair of gloves than two singleton lefties (or righties), I suppose.

name: stubob
text: Yeah. Who calls anybody anymore?!

name: eidolem
text: This is the first time I've noticed that Pat wears shoes.  The random nature of clothing and accessories in Achewood pleases me tremendously.

name: old_crow
text: Any ideas on why Nice Pete hasn't KILLED Pat yet?

name: anticitizen
text: Maybe Nice Pete has gone tame amongst the general population?

name: mrflunchy
text: I love how Ray thinks that donkey milk would be fine with vegans.

name: aamzed
text: Fucking excellent.

name: addison
text: Great strip

name: greenkoolayd
text:
dear nice pete,

please eat pats liver with fava beans and a nice chianti. i will pay you the sum of $1,759.00

signed,
me

name: duperando
text: The way pat looks, all not wearing any clothes except those black shoes; it's pants-crappingly hilarious.

name: duperando
text:
Pat looks freaking hilarious in panel six, all cat-naked with people shoes. Why is pat naked, yet he has no junk? And yet just a few panels back he was very junkified?
'Tis a secret.

name: duperando
text: wow. Lame. I totally already said that first part. Lame for me.

name: carlyle
text: Last panel shows why details are important

name: changuitotuerto
text: The BEST best part of this strip is that Ray and Simon are drinking martinis and seem to have been lying about the coffee machine entirely.

name: lunchbox
text: I really do like the dynamic between Pete and Pat. It's almost as though Pat fuels Pete's rage so much that it actually makes Pete feel good.

name: cab234
text: Donkey milk is made from soy, on account a vegan donkeys eatin' so much of it.
